website_summaries.verdict: Inspired by pro surfer Mick Fanning, these water-friendly sandals are the perfect kicks for a trip to the beach.
pros: These sporty sandals have everything from comfort, support, an air pocket in the heel, and a bottle opener in the footbed!
Comes in Black, Black and Grey 2, Black and Mint, and Dusty Taupe
Synthetic nubuck upper, contoured CMEVA footbed, iconic Reef herringbone rubber outsole
cons: Some report sandals with black straps leave marks on feet

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: 4 years ago, on Labor Day weekend, I bought my first pair of reefs. I have used these and wore them every single day from May thru September, but finally decided it was time for a replacement. I love the quality of these shoes, but putting my foot in one of the old ones with my other foot in one of the new ones, there is a huge change in feeling. The quality is there, but the strap has stretched over time, constant wearing and walking, being soaking wet, the heat, the dirt, the cold, etc. I will continue buying these exact shoes Every couple years.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: but all of them provide good support with the air cushion in the heel
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the Reef Fannning Flip Flop since 2009. I buy different colors, such as the black leopard, or the black pair I recently purchased, but all of them provide good support with the air cushion in the heel. I live on the Gulf Coast, so I need something cool to wear on my feet due to the warm climate. They make great shoes at the beach, and the opener on the bottom comes in handy sometimes. I hope they continue to make this style, because it's a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Film Fan

customer_reviews.title: We love our Reefs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Reefs!!! I have worn the same reef flip flops all summer long, camping and tubing down down the river for the last 8 years or so. Still nothing wrong with them besides the normal wear down. Still comfy as ever! But this year I decided to splurge on a new pair. Never been so excited to get my amazon delivery! Got hubby a new pair too! We are Reef die hards for sure. Most comfortable flip flop ever!! I’ll be good now for another 8 years. (Maybe) 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Shyann Hill

customer_reviews.title: Where that ole soul?
customer_reviews.text: These are not necessarily replacing an older pair of Reefs (because twice they've gone into the trash and twice I've pulled them back out.) I ordered these because the original pair I have are so cushy. Although the new pair is comfortable, they sadly lack the same cushion soles. I had ordered a man's pair last year and still see the cushy soles. (What up with that?) My original pair was a size 7 and today I need a size 8. My feet have grown, but the sizing had to have changed in the past few years...just saying. They also run a tad wide which is good for my almost "wide" foot...just saying.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Reefs are hands down the best flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: I've bought and worn reef flip-flops for years. I have ordered from both the reef store and on amazon. Normally I wear a 7.5 and the last couple pairs I've ordered were a size 8 and the fit perfect. Not sure if sizing changed a tad but these are a true 8. They are lose for my feet. But the color and detail match the picture and I like them. Just wish they were a 1/4 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand of sandals when I was on vacation when I was 15 I’m now in my 40s and they are still my favorite flip flop ! This time when I purchased them I ordered the same size that I always have a size 8 and this time they were a bit snug but I put them on and wore them around the house and broke them in and they are as comfortable as they always have been but I will probably order a half a size up next time so I have a bit more room being they ran a little bit smaller this time but other then that these are the best sandals I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Melissa s.

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer a 1/2 size larger but like the snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Wished these came in 1/2 sizes as they barely fit my length of my foot. Would have preferred a 7-1/2 but I’ve always been happy with overall comfort of Reefs. I like the arch support that these provide and the snug fit so that you don’t feel like you could easily walk out of your shoes or that you might turn an ankle because the fit lets your foot slide back and forth in gait.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Broden

customer_reviews.title: Wear them anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reef flip flops ever since I bought my first pair in the beach town of San Clemente over 30 years ago. I have a high arch and my feet don't get tired in Reefs. They can get wet. I wore them inner tubing down a river in Helen, Georgia, and I didn't loose them. I just clamped my toes down and they stayed on. They last for years, and they don't rub sores between your toes like some flip flops - you don't need to break them in. They keep their shape and stay looking sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Spaulding Serna

customer_reviews.title: Supportive for a flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I had been having trouble with the sides of my feet hurting after walking for very long with regular flip flops. These are well made and supportive. Very stylish too. Not sure if I will ever use the bottle opener on bottom, but it is a nice conversations piece! The foot bed of the shoe is kind of rough, but it does keep them from sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: October

customer_reviews.title: They've gone downhill fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm incredibly disappointed with my most recent purchase of these shoes. I've been wearing Reefs for years and always loved the fit and support, but I just bought a pair of these and after walking in them for 2 hours, they're still hard as a rock. Arch support has disappeared almost completely. Sole no longer has any give and is just a solid hunk of hard rubber. I cannot recommend these anymore (I used to tell everyone about them). Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and useful
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for these sandals!!! Camping season is going to be the best with these bad boys!! I won't have to go looking for a pop top I'll have them on my feet!! Not sure how I'm going to keep everything sanitary, but they're kind of recessed into the sandal so hopefully that will help avoid some of the debris around the mouth of the bottle at least.
customer_reviews.author: SingleClutchMom

customer_reviews.title: Sand flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I like these, they are very rigid but great on sand. The bottle opener is a bonus and they are comfortable however I would not wear these as a daily slide. I’m happy to take these to the beach or lake where I won’t be doing any serious walking. I need arch support but these definitely serve a purpose and are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J Szilagyi

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair of the Reef Fannings I now own. It's my go-to for summer (spring & fall too). They are so comfortable. The only complaint I have is the wicked tan-lines on my feet from the straps, but I still choose them first every day. And it's fun being able to produce a bottle opener when no one else has one. These seem to run true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish and Durable.
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are great. They are comfortable, supportive, durable and fashionable. I have been wearing Reefs for over 7 years and they never disappoint. I can wear these flip flops all day (I have used this brand all day at theme parks for a weeks time every day) and my feet fell great. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: love these, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: love Reef Fanning model, I'm bummed that you can't buy these anymore, so I ordered 2 pairs that should last me the next 10-15 years. All my previous reefs have lasted 5-7 years. They fit nice, give great support and are extremely comfortable. I don't buy any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: SuperflyCabral

customer_reviews.title: Reef seems to be cutting corners
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Reef Fanning sandals for almost a decade (including 2 years in Hawaii when they were literally the only shoe I wore) because they were comfortable, durable, stylish, and functional. This pair is my 4th and I could tell as soon as I picked them up, something has changed with their manufacture. They are lighter (not in a good way) - the materials seem lighter, like molded plastic, and the sole is one formed/cast piece rather than a construction of sole and support inserts. I suspect that the sole will wear out much faster than previous pairs. I'm hoping I'm wrong, and these last as long as my others have, but I suspect that won't be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Shick

customer_reviews.title: They don't make these like they used to
customer_reviews.text: these sandals used to be called the cloud because it felt like you're walking on a cloud. Now they are super stiff and hard. I don't understand where they went wrong. Please go back to the way they used to make them! They do still have more arch support than other flip flops so I gave them two stars if you can handle how hard as a rock they are.
customer_reviews.author: ~A

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, though a bit too snug.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time prime never lets me down, perfect color, great quality as always as expected from reef, however it seems like the straps are tighter than they used to be, I wear a 9, and yes I know they will stretch some with wear, but my old pair were not this tight when I purchased them and I have very bony feet. That is the only reason for the 4 star rating, it is uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time, as it rubs the top of my foot unforgivingly.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These thongs are hard and not comfortable for a long walk or all day wear. The symbol rubs off the first time you wear them. So it makes me wonder if these shoes are a knock off. I was told this brand name of thongs are good. I just don't like them in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews but after wearing them all day today, my feet were killing me. In between the toes, all over. What a waste of money. I am getting so tired of getting junk that I will stop ordering from Amazon all together
customer_reviews.author: cancel

customer_reviews.title: A little snug but getting better
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few of these over the years. I bought myself and my sister a pair of these. They were REALLY tight in the first 20 plus wearings and are slowly getting better. I don't recall that from any pair previously. They're very durable and don't need replacements for at least 2 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Can always rely on these!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly. I did have the same style but different design before so I knew my typical running shoe size is the size I’d need for the flip flops. I do like the thickness to it. Definitely gives better support than other flip flops that are thin and wears out in months. It is pricier however definitely worth it if you are looking for comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love Reefs
customer_reviews.text: I love reefs. i believe i had my first pair of Reefs for almost 8 years and lived in them. well, after 8 years they took a turn for the worst. just bought my second pair and still love them! they hold up so well and never had a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Gebbs

customer_reviews.title: I love Reef and this is why!
customer_reviews.text: Though I ordered another pair of my old favorites, Fanning caught my eye. Not because of the church key, but the reviews -across the web- were overwhelmingly positive. And they're all right! I put them on and they felt like old friends at once. The fit is perfect, there is great arch support and I even jogged a bit in them because they're so springy feeling - the 'airbag'? Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: pamibe

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 sizes order up not down
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 and usually wear a size 9 sandals when 1/2 sizes are not available. These were too snug for me, my big toe touched the edge at the top and the part between my toes was too tight. I have returned these and ordered a size 10. Returning was easy, printed the free postage paid label and as soon as the post office received it Amazon had issued my refund/credit. I really like this sandal and am optimistic the size 10 will be perfect. I will update my review when I receive the size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Spillman

customer_reviews.title: Heel tag...
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these because there is a very scratchy prominent tag sewn into the heel of the foot bed if you're like me and you can't stand tags in your clothes or on your shoes this is not for you. Cute flip flop ruined by tag placement. They were delivered in good condition on time but I just had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: NoneYa

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: The Reef Fanning Sandel is sturdy. The area between the toe will take some breaking in, but I have worn the Sandel and it does seem to get better. I like the look and fit of them. My last Reefs lasted 10 + years-wow! I am growing to love them and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: LOLATUM

customer_reviews.title: they stink to high heaven (when my feet normally don't smell bad!! ) and they fit differently than my ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT THE SAME REEFS! I think they are fakes. I know they're sold by Amazon but they are not wearing well, they stink to high heaven (when my feet normally don't smell bad!!) and they fit differently than my previous identical REAL pair from Reef.com. I have horrendous blisters, my feet hurt and they smell awful - not Reefs. NOT Reefs. Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Reefs for years and each new pair I buy seem to be getting stiffer in the sole and tighter in the strap. Definitely not as comfortable as they used to be. They run small so if you’re in between sizes, size up.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Gurl

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet....
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a similar mens version of these and his fit me great! I dont enjoy ordering mens shoes all the time and hoped these would have fit. Nope...not the size 10 wide foot. Im returning and ordering a men's size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sandals. I had to return the first pair and get a smaller pair. I wear a 7 in all my shoes but had to get a 6 in these. They work well around the pool and I don’t slip everywhere. They are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Reef Fannings are my favorite flip-flop! I bought these to replace a pair that finally broke after many years of use. Excellent quality, fit, and fashion. I don't understand why there's a bottle opener on the sole though. I think it's kind of gross.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal

customer_reviews.title: I am retiring my first pair to use working in the yard and didn't want to be without so ordered a new pair from Amazon - they ar
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Reef Fanning Flip Flops. I am retiring my first pair to use working in the yard and didn't want to be without so ordered a new pair from Amazon - they are great! I can wear them all day without any problems. I did read a review stating they were not too great because they were made in Viet Nam - It is true the label says made in Viet Nam. I don't know where my first pair were made but I bought them at a surf shop. These fit and look exactly the same. The price on Amazon is good - the price at Zappos is over $50. Five stars :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Last and last
customer_reviews.text: Wear them every day and love them. Heavy duty flip flop that will last for years. This is my second pair and the first pair lasted eight years. Large wide strap, sturdy sole, Easy grip sole.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best sandle/flip flop I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these flip flops for years, and have never been disappointed. I usually order a new pair or two every couple years as they do wear out. They cushion the foot, and provide much needed arch support plus the bottle opener on the sole is a very handy tool to have! I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far not sure...
customer_reviews.text: I have had five pair of Fannings that I have bought in stores. This size 7 seems to be a little smaller than all of my other pairs. I received them yesterday and noticed animal hair and other debris on the bottom. I believe they may have been used.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Winter

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. A little wide but i just size down. I normally wear an 8 in women’s but got a 7 and they fit great except a little wide but that makes them comfortable and a great flop to wear to the beach or just to hang out in. I wear them all the time...as soon as i get home from work...I don’t like to be barefoot so these are perfect to wear around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Va Bch Osprey Lover

customer_reviews.title: Not made like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: If you have a very fat foot then these should be fine otherwise don't buy them since they have been made in China it is not the same product that I have been wearing for years.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Complete Junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of these for 4 months. I haven't worn them everyday. The sole on the left one has separated from the shoe and now flops around at will. I can't wear them as it is a tripping hazard. Complete waste of 50 bucks. Very disappointed. Will never buy another pair of Reefs.
customer_reviews.author: rootessa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good quality sandal. Not sure how I feel about the bottle opener on the bottom yet...but it’s an interesting option. I paid more for these sandals than I normally would paid for sandals but I like the colors and I expect to get several years out of them. They are very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MegaRaf

customer_reviews.title: Great support sandals
customer_reviews.text: Good support and makes walking feel good. They should be replaced every year, however, because, if you use them as much as I do the soles will wear and they will stretch a bit and then it gets a bit harder to walk comfortably. They certainly have more support than just summer ( cheap) sandals. I have arthritis in one foot and it is imperative I wear supportive foot products. This one works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn A

customer_reviews.title: True to size but half sizes would work even better
customer_reviews.text: A little snug but it should adjust soon, I think they are going to last a long time. Will buy them in a different color when they become available again, definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable the second they are put on; no need to break in. Also, they do not stretch out very much.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair. I’ve worn these for years, they do not wear out, I just get where I want another color. This past year I’ve gotten plantar fasciitis. I paid for custom arch support insoles from my podiatrist. These flip flops are much better! My feet do not hurt at all when I wear these. My husband also is a long time fan. People get a kick out of the bottle opener!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Y.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: this is why I never write a review when I first get something. Very dissappointed. Reef have always been great but now I would not purchase another show made by them. I believe I purchased them in July so they're not even broke in good yet.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flops ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Fanning flip flops are the most innovative product to ever hit the summer footwear industry. There is a bottle opener conveniently located in the sole of these sandals. When you are at the lake or the beach, with no pockets, and someone tosses you a cold Corona, these shoes will be mighty handy! My wife and I have been wearing Reef Fanning flip flops for well over 10 years... yes they will actually last that long too. They are well built and have many fantastic color combinations.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Authenic Reefs or Imposters?
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef Fanning, but these are way too narrow, the straps are stiff, and the foot base is about 1/2 size too short. I can wear them for about 1 hour before my feet are killing me. Either these are fakes, or the manufacturer has drastically changed the way they are made.
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reefs for years. Best flip flops around. Sturdy and supportive and comfortable. I bought these to replace a pair that is 15 years old. I expect to have these for the next 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Risa L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sandal. Very durable. I’m quite rough with mine and each pair looks good for a year, ok for another year, then too rough for public use. One thing they have never done is fall apart. I swim in mine, wear them in the hot tub, throw them in the clothes washer n dishwasher. I have been run one over in the car without damaging it. Quite comfortable too. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I love my old Reef's
customer_reviews.text: I love my old Reef's. As summer was approaching, I wanted to get a new pair. I ordered these since they were cheaper than my local sporting store. These arrived and we're extremely loose. I went to the local sporting store and tried the same shoes on and they fit just as loose. Sad to see that Reef's quality is deteriorating.
customer_reviews.author: pritty1npink

customer_reviews.title: Same great product I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and supportive flip-flops I've ever owned. This is my second pair now. They are definitely worth the money. I wear them to the lake and my feet don't slide out of them when they're wet. They're still extremely grippy. I love the bottle opener and use it all the time. I wore my first pair almost daily and they're just now starting to show a little bit of wear after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased at least four pairs of these flip flops in the past. Because I had always been so happy with the product, I expected to be just as happy with it this time. That did not happen. The size is larger and the logo embossed on the heel area is so deep that it makes the flip flops uncomfortable to wear. I would have returned the product, but I had worn them to try to break them in and I became even more unhappy with them. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: LRJ

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wear flip flops 90% of the time. Cheap ones would flatten or fall apart. 3 years ago I bought my first pair. It was in the winter time so flip flops weren't in season. I googled the top brands this brand was number 2 because number 1 wasn't available. My first pair finally gave way near the toe. Added bonus is the bottle opener on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spracklen

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals and literally come back every couple years to buy another pair. They are thick and fit great. I love them and wear them 24/7 in the summer and they last me like 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Reef Fannings are great.
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef Fannings. They are comfortable between my toes and support my feet. The bottle opener is a novelty, but works when needed. These are my sixth pair....it is possible to wear them out if you wear them enough. It is a shame that they seem to be being phased out...you can't find many different color combos anymore.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: One shoe was stretched out
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops however the right shoe was stretched out and very loose compared to the left shoe. This is going to drive me crazy. Im going to try and stretch the left shoe so that they at least feel the same when wearing them instead of one fitted and one loose. These are true to size. If the right would of fit like the left I would of left 5 stars for sure. I want to love these flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Nobles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Reef Flip Flops!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the Reef Fanning Flip Flop! SOOOOO Comfortable and SOOOO much suport. I have a very high arch and these flips flops fill it well....unlike cheap/flat/slippery ones. The grip on the bottom is awesome.....no slidding around the pool deck. Not sure who would actually use the bottle opener?? Kind of gross to put a bottle to your lips after opening it with the bottom of your shoe! I'm a tad disappointed in the pink.....it's more of a mauve and a bit dull, but oh well. Love the shoe anyway!!!!!! This is my second pair and I will be buying more, as I see the price drop. $50 is kind of pricey.....but then again, you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: shelleym

customer_reviews.title: strap broke after only a year!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals ever. I bought my first pair when they first came out over 10 years ago. After about 6 years of use the strap which goes in between your toes broke. I was very bummed and I hesitated to buy another pair because they are a little pricey. However, I finally did buy another pair about a year ago. Yesterday I noticed they felt a little loose and I looked down and saw the strap had broken again! So disappointed. As a single mom, I safely can not justify buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: brianna rice

customer_reviews.title: Short straps
customer_reviews.text: I had the same pair years ago and never had fitting issues. This pair doesn’t have enough room to be a comfortable fit. Straps are cut too short
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sandal, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a new pair of these sandals each spring for the last 10 years, because I live in them and they are so incredibly comfortable and durable. The old pair always gets demoted to “housework shoes” or around the farm/gardening etc. While the new pair gets broken in. I personally don’t use the bottle opener, mostly because who knows where you’ve stepped, but the sandals themselves have excellent arch support and unmatched comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin Rowe

customer_reviews.title: My gamble....a little big
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble & ordered an 8 since it was the only size available. I typically wear a 7 1/2 and have purchased multiple 7's of the same style Reef bottle opener sandal prior to this. Although I will get by with these, I would prefer the 7's due to a more snug fit. If you prefer a looser fit, order the 8's. I still love these as they are quite comfortable & will last a couple years. Of course, the bottle opener has come in handy multiple times!!!!
customer_reviews.author: turk

customer_reviews.title: Only flip flops I will wear
customer_reviews.text: Always love reefs. Been wearing them for about 10 years and only have purchased 3 due to the durability. Wear them almost everyday in the summer and they only get better with age.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I returned for refund. My big toe was hanging over to edge. I have two other pairs of reef sandals that size 10 is perfect, these fit more like a size 9
customer_reviews.author: Annoynomus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with narrow width
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of pink/black Fanning Sandals I bought about 6 years ago and they are fantastic. It was time for a new pair, so I got these expecting the same great sandal. Unfortunately, it seems they made these a lot more narrow than before, so very disappointed in width-fit. I will have to try to stretch them to be able to wear them comfortably. :(
customer_reviews.author: k-dubya

customer_reviews.title: More woman’s options please.
customer_reviews.text: Love me some Reef bottle opener flip flops. If only they had as many options in woman’s. Apparently women don’t drink beer! I know this girl does. Overall it. Will always buy Reef and not much else.
customer_reviews.author: carrie barnicle

customer_reviews.title: Owned the fanning before and loved them. This time bought the Rover and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned the fanning before and loved them. This time bought the Rover and the Fanning together. The Fanning is noticeably tighter in the arch strap than the Rover however it's not uncomfortable and I'm confident that they will stretch. My only complaint is that the Reef's I owned before had white soles which I could not find as an option anywhere this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Auti

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of reef sandals and I love them. They stand the test of time are well-made and extremely comfortable. I live in Florida and have worn them pretty much every day since I purchased them. They are holding up great and still practically look brand-new. I also like the extra feature of a bottle opener on the bottom of the sandal it has come in handy many times. It's also made a few of my friends laugh LOL . I plan on purchasing a different color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar

customer_reviews.title: Love my bottle cap opener sandals!!!!☺️
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite sandal! Definitely worth the price! Excellent quality! Love the bottle cap opener on the bottom. ☺️ Great for the beach or around a campfire in the mountains!!!
customer_reviews.author: nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: These ARE cute, but they are just flip flops. Nothing special here. Well, maybe the bottle opener on the bottom of each one, if that's important to you. And if it is, you're going to pay for it! I gave them a 3 star rating because the pink around the edges began to crack after just 10 days. From what I can tell, the color on them is PAINT! And that's what it looks like, "cracked paint". Not very attractive, but I kept them because I just kick around in them anyway. For the price of them, I just didn't expect that. I wouldn't recommend these sandals to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaG

customer_reviews.title: A size larger
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the 9 which I always wear for a TEN!!! I bought SAME brand at DSW and were 8/9....so I arrogantly ordered 9.... But I LOVE these. Able to wear flops most of the year in TX so gotta get some with a little support. Even if a size larger 😕
customer_reviews.author: GracieJane'sMama

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Reef Fanning and this one is1/4" shorter than other two, which made my big toes hang over the edge. Size 6
customer_reviews.author: ChattTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had back surgery and these are the only flip flops that are comfortable for her to walk or stand in for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hale

customer_reviews.title: Love my Reefs!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Reef's for over 15 years. Sadly, I finally replaced them with these new, great reefs. Am a happy camper now!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, runs a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy flip flops, great support. I wear an 8.5 normally and the 8 fit, my heals right on the end but it’s still comfortable. The straps loosened a little once I wore them a few times and they fit great now. Good for walking the dog and running errands
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $ over cheap flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I loves these sandals. This is my third pair of flip flops similar to these. Once I had a pair of these, I can't go back to the cheapo ones. These have support for your feet and are quite comfortable. As an added bonus for camping or tailgating, these have a bottle opener on the bottom, which can be quite handy once you figure out the correct angle so you don't spill all over. I have recommended these sandals to many of my friends and haven't heard any complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: teachermom

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as all my other Reef Fanning size 7
customer_reviews.text: They came in marked as size 7 but they are much smaller so they must be mis-sized or made wrong. I'm returning these and hoping to find another pair that will be true to fit but afraid to get same color.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Go-To Flip Flop for 15 Years
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of Reefs in this style. They’re my go to flip flop for all summer long. Supportive, cushy and doravle.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: There's no arch support in these pair from my experience.
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm, if you are considering of buying these pairs for arch support, I wouldn't recommend it. I have to stick Dr. foot arch support silicone stuff to feel~ the arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Baerner

customer_reviews.title: Good flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for a good pair of flip flops to replace a pair I've had for years and love to death. These are a decent replacement. - They fit as expected - The are comfortable - I didn't experience any blisters when I wore them *The only negative thing I will say is that I wish they were a little but softer on the bed of the foot. They also seemed to get a little harder over time. But that could also be because I wore them every day. If I can't find another pair I like more next year, I will definitely reorder Reefs
customer_reviews.author: Cat J

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! I bought 2 pairs on Amazon in the last month. My old pair lasted me 8 years! I bought them in May 2009 in North Carolina and they're still in great shape but really stretched out. My feet were really wide and I used to wear a mens but now I've lost a lot of weight and can fit in the womens. I also love the bottle opener on the bottom. It's come in handy many times 😊 I have no desire to ever buy a different brand of sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Binder

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I had to return my size 7 for an 8--the seven was exact to size and my foot was right on the very edge both the heel and toes. I just received the size 8 and it fits much better. So far they fit comfortably. I think the lether strap needs to be worn a bit to loosen up. Overall I like them!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere for these after my significant other purchased some and raved how comfortable they are. Perhaps we have different expectations or there was a difference in men's and women's but I think they're pretty hard despite the air cushion. That said, they're very durable, very well made and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: MorganFSU

customer_reviews.title: Good Reefs, but not flawless
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning, I had to break them in. Before I did that, they were giving me blisters on the bottom of my feet for a while.... For whatever reason, I find that after wearing these shoes for more than a few hours my shins hurt while walking. It only ever happens with these...never with previous Reefs.
customer_reviews.author: Shanee Osher

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Flop
customer_reviews.text: I am usually 6.5 regular in most shoes so I ordered in 6. Once I tried the size 7, it was so the way to go, much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have owed the same pair since 2004 and they just broke at the material connection in 2013. The old sandals still work because the main connection is still attached. These new ones are still being broke in but it is still the same quality. These new Fannings are ridged when you first wear them, but they form to your foot after a few times. Others have said they are uncomfortable, I can see this if you are wearing them on concrete, they're not a distance walking shoe. I would recommend buying a half size larger, I'm consistently an 8.5 women's but the 9 works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these. She loves the color and comfort of these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loves them. She has bought other styles in the Reef brand which living in Florida would only last her two summers. I suggested these to her since I buy this style and get A longer longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but not a good fit for a size 7, straps too loose and wide
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first pair of Reef’s, so I know the feeling of a brand new pair. The straps on these shoes are very loose and wide almost like someone with a wide foot tried them on before I received them. I am not happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: I find myself always coming back to Reefs because of the comfortable fit, the overall quality of wearability/durability but most ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Reefs for decades now. There are a lot of sandal Brands and models out there. I find myself always coming back to Reefs because of the comfortable fit, the overall quality of wearability/durability but most especially because of the toe strap. The toe strap is for me one of the most important must have comfort elements. I usually go for the standard basic women's balck thin straps (which is a little more feminine). This design while a bit wider and sporty, again the toe strap fabric and design is extremely comfortable as is the additional lift air comfort to the heel on impact. Extremely good sandal all around for price.
customer_reviews.author: WNIWL

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cute!! Very happy with them. They're a tad bit on the bigger side, but still perfectly wearable and comfy. They look exactly like they do in the picture, and are nice and cushy under the feet when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz. S

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Great flip flop, my wife got some in 8 years ago and she finally wanted some new ones, the flip flop strap was starting to crack from being left in the sun on our deck for years. She talked them up so much I got the mens version and boy are they top quality. Best I ever owned and they seem like they will last. The support in these is crazy for a flip flop, I dont recommend it but you could probably go running in these things.
customer_reviews.author: BigSlice

customer_reviews.title: How well they are made
customer_reviews.text: I really love how comfortable they are and how well they fit -they are sturdy and fit like a glove - great quality
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Bender

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals ever! Can walk around Disney all day in them and my feet never hurt. Great support and comfortable. They are expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals!
customer_reviews.text: The best sandals! I had a pair I purchased about 10 years ago to wear around the house, and they finally broke. Boo. Fortunately I was able to find this pair and remembered the size. They are so, so comfortable, particularly for a person like me with almost no arch. I would buy again in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: Panchita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my third pair; still wearing a pair I got 5 years ago for yard working. Just love these sandals!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Grey

customer_reviews.title: let me say that I have been purchasing Reef shoes for years and loved them, until now
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I have been purchasing Reef shoes for years and loved them, until now. I got this pair to replace a pair I had had for over 2 years with no issues. However, when I got this pair wet on vacation it was absolutely horrible. Whatever coating is on them now is not water friendly and what good is a flip flop if you can't get them wet?? They smell so bad now that I cannot even wear them. I even had to purchase new shoes on vacation. Don't waste your money on these anymore as it appears their quality is declining.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: great footwear
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals. They are comfortable and I recommend them. Their cost was very reasonable compared to the purchase price in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: L R Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like my old pair of reef fanning
customer_reviews.text: I have an old pair of reef fanning that I bought in a resort store. I love them. And now I still wear them because this new pair is nothing like them. Not as much cushion. Not a comfortable toe strap. Doesn't stay on my foot as well as the old pair. It's like a knock off production because all the qualities I love are not in this new pair. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: used to be much much better quality. the rubber is super hard
customer_reviews.text: not sure what happened to reef quality. bought 4 pairs recently thinking I was ordering the wrong style... used to be much much better quality. the rubber is super hard, the straps don't fit like they used to. just not good shoes anymore. wont buy reef again.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: I'm returning these due to the black and emblem flaking ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning these due to the black and emblem flaking off the top of the shoe after my wife wore them once. My wife and I only wear Reefs and have had no issues. Very dissappointed wth these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barden

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking with Jeans and Sporty Skirts
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, good for walking outside, on the sand, on the sidewalk. The bottle opener on the bottom entertains me endlessly even though I don't think would be very sanitary to use. Lol. I have medium to almost wide feet and this width is perfect. Slight arch support. The straps relax after several wears. Comfy. And all BLACK.
customer_reviews.author: RBG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great flip flops with a bottle opener if needed. Good price with free delivery
customer_reviews.author: noel rauch

product_meta.title: Reef Fanning Womens Sandals | Bottle Opener Flip Flops For Women
product_meta.description: Fanning womens sandals are REEF’s top-selling flip flops for women with a church key bottle opener built into the rubber outsole. These are the water-friendly womens sandals of legendary three-time world champ and perennial pro surfing powerhouse Mick Fanning. With the Fanning womens sandals, you get maximum comfort with the molded EVA footbed, anatomical arch support, 360-degree heel airbag, and synthetic nubuck strap. Be ready for any water adventure with these flip flops for women. These are the only mens sandals with a bottle opener. From the beach to the lake or just hanging out by the pool, this style can handle the splashes.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC FLIP FLOPS: Reef's Star Cushion Sassy flip flops are handcrafted to be with you no matter where your next adventure takes you. The classic design and versatility means you can seamlessly go from brunch to the beach.

DURABLE: Star Cushion Sassy flip flops are water friendly so you can go from deck chairs to waves and anywhere in between. Go ahead, surf check, dip your toes in the lake or survive an intense splash fight without worry.
NO BREAK-IN PERIOD: Packed with comfort and support, the Star Cushion Sassy sandal will keep your feet comfortable no matter where they take you.

SUPERIOR STRAP: The environmentally friendly, 10% PVC Free strap ensures your whole foot is comfortable while the sparkly strap means fun times in the sunlight or the moonlight. The Star Cushion Sassy is the perfect addition to any outfit.

BEACH FREELY WITH REEF: We are encouraging people around the world to embrace the fun, freedom and spirit of the beach while living life by one simple rule: Beach Freely. Our products are designed to make you feel comfortable, relaxed and free in any environment, whether you're at the beach or not.
